sentences.sentence: What the hell is this about? You think I’m some kind of criminal?
Look, I don’t know what you’re trying to pull, but you’re barking up the wrong tree.
I’ve been working hard, doing my job. You think I’ve got time to commit some crime?
<color=red>That knife</color>? It’s from the shop. I was cutting meat. You know how it is.
I don’t know who planted that idea in your head, but you’d better leave it alone.
You’ve got no proof, no reason to be acting like this.
You don’t know the first thing about me or my work. So, stop accusing me!
If you’re so sure I did something, go talk to the others. I’ve got nothing to hide.
Now, if you’re done here, I suggest you leave. I don’t have time for this nonsense.
